channel.title: Complaints about staff
channel.description:
This topic has been made to replace the previous topic (which was removed because it was being misused).
The rules are simple: This topic is for complaints about staff conduct. In other words, if you think a staff member has unfairly warned you then post here.
This topic is not for complaining about moderator choices.
Reminder: This isn't for staff praise, either. Don't post things like "Oh, I love [insert moderator here], he's so cool!". We're asking for complaints, and posting praise isn't going to help.
Second Reminder: This thread is [b]NOT[/b] for controversy with other members [b]OR[/b] personal issues with your account. This was stuck so that you would all stop making staff complain threads in sections they didn't belong. You're here to complain about the staff not cooperating, their lack of effort, abuse of power, bad judgment, etc. Please try to keep to the topic.

item.title: Complaints about staff
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

I’ve decided that it’s time for this topic to be removed.

If you have any genuine complaints (ie, you make a post that’s actually intelligent and someone mutes you for the next decade) then message an administrator or global mod.
Don’t message us about ridiculous things, especially if you were in the wrong, because we’ll either ignore it completely (if you’re lucky) or we’ll punish you further.

Read full topic

item.title: Complaints about staff
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“Si Force, post:1546, topic:249774”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=329269.msg3344069#msg3344069 date=1284676702]
And female’s have periods, where they usually get upset or mad easily, which is a perfectly logical reason as to why she may hand out punishments so quickly.

Not trying to argue, I’m just trying to say my point.
[/quote]

I was the one who warned you actually, not anybody else.[/quote]Doesn’t bother me at all, and I wasn’t assuming who it was anyways :3

Read full topic

item.title: Complaints about staff
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:1543, topic:249774”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=329269.msg3344002#msg3344002 date=1284672987]

[quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=329269.msg3343912#msg3343912 date=1284665761]

Jews had no reason to be hated by Hitler. So they had no reason to be glad to be out of the internment camps. EOD.

Worse logic. And horrible analogy.
[/quote]The whole point was that it was flawed logic. I was rushed so I just thought of the first thing that came to mind.

Feel free to make your own analogy, but an analogy wasn’t required anyway

I’m just pointing out that you suck at analogizing; therefore, you shouldn’t ever do it again.
[/quote]I’m pretty sure that my analogy is relative to whoever reads it. For example, a Jew might understand, but a Nazi would think that it was complete bullshit.

My point was that he has no reason NOT to be glad he was unbanned.

Sorry bud, you’re wrong. Suckish analogy is suckish.[/quote]No one says why? =/
@rip4d, I’ll stop now too

Read full topic

item.title: Complaints about staff
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:1539, topic:249774”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=329269.msg3343912#msg3343912 date=1284665761]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=329269.msg3343765#msg3343765 date=1284644548]

Jews had no reason to be hated by Hitler. So they had no reason to be glad to be out of the internment camps. EOD.

Worse logic. And horrible analogy.
[/quote]The whole point was that it was flawed logic. I was rushed so I just thought of the first thing that came to mind.

Feel free to make your own analogy, but an analogy wasn’t required anyway

I’m just pointing out that you suck at analogizing; therefore, you shouldn’t ever do it again.
[/quote]I’m pretty sure that my analogy is relative to whoever reads it. For example, a Jew might understand, but a Nazi would think that it was complete bullshit.

My point was that he has no reason NOT to be glad he was unbanned.[/quote]
Sorry bud, you’re wrong. Suckish analogy is suckish.

[quote=“rip4d, post:1541, topic:249774”]Eh, I guess I have a complaint.

I got warned for spam (that post about women and periods, why Silab may be rash with her decisions sometimes) and yet there are people arguing over an analogy in this thread? I find that rather unfair.[/quote]
Sorry about that; I’ll stop now, even if he responds.

@yourpost: I think it’s just that she’s a female and took it a bit more serious than a male would. Nothing wrong there.

Read full topic

item.title: Complaints about staff
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:1541, topic:249774”]Eh, I guess I have a complaint.

I got warned for spam (that post about women and periods, why Silab may be rash with her decisions sometimes) and yet there are people arguing over an analogy in this thread? I find that rather unfair.[/quote]Well you know how these things go, at first it was on-topic (about the banning which included the analogy) then someone said ‘bad analogy’, then we had a short quote train, and then I replied etc

tbh a mod should just delete the entire thing about the analogy, seeing as how all of the banning posts were deleted.

Read full topic

item.title: Complaints about staff

item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

Just a warning to the other moderators, Stop bringing information in the moderator discussion to any public thread, IRC, off site communications (unless its with another mod of these forums).

Warning to the other members: If you have a problem with your account bring it up with moderators directly its not a subject for public remarks.

Read full topic

item.title: Complaints about staff
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:93, topic:320741”][quote author=`Aaron link=topic=329269.msg3341553#msg3341553 date=1284415215]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=329269.msg3341550#msg3341550 date=1284415004]

Silab banned me and pure2ownage for no particular reason. I asked for the reason, though she didn’t tell me.

A permanent ban aswell, :L

We thought you were the same person. We were proven wrong and we fixed our error. Our apologies.
[/quote]What caused you to think they were the same person?

Stupidity.
[/quote]I doubt it, everyone makes false assumptions based on incorrect evidence (take the Big Bang). I was just wondering what that evidence was.[/quote]

Well instead of banning on assumption they could have checked IP’s (not that everyone uses a normal browser while browsing mspc, such as a proxy, etc) Or find a time when they are both online and get them in IRC.

Read full topic

Peace, No worries about me coming back, mods are currupt (not CJ, Frell, and like 2 others i cba to think of atm). This was a major over-reaction on your part, that is un-needed. I get your a Women so your correct or we sleep on the couch. That’s fine, I’ll still argue with women on the way out there.[/quote]Retribution gets you nowhere.
